pr_title: Add display name for the "theme" plugin label

timeline.message: Add display name for the "theme" plugin label

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            UpdateCenter.PluginCategory.theme=User Interface Themes
          
          
            
            UpdateCenter.PluginCategory.theme=Themes
timeline.author: timja
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -324,6 +324,7 @@ UpdateCenter.PluginCategory.scm-related=Source Code Management related
 UpdateCenter.PluginCategory.security=Security
 UpdateCenter.PluginCategory.slaves=Agent Launchers and Controllers
 UpdateCenter.PluginCategory.test=Testing
+UpdateCenter.PluginCategory.theme=User Interface Themes

replies.bodyText: I've been thinking a bit about it. Wouldn't "Appearance" make sense? It would make it a broader category.
replies.author: fqueiruga

replies.bodyText:
Do you need a broader category though?
if you're after a theme don't you want a theme?
replies.author: timja

replies.bodyText: Didn't know about the UI category. Ignore my comment then.
replies.author: fqueiruga

replies.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            UpdateCenter.PluginCategory.theme=User Interface Themes
          
          
            
            UpdateCenter.PluginCategory.theme=UI Themes
          
      
    
    
  

But I like idea about appearance. I always wanted a category for the Chuck Norris Plugin
replies.author: oleg-nenashev

replies.bodyText: Which is ui? Or change it to UpdateCenter.PluginCategory.ui=Appearance if you like the term better?
replies.author: daniel-beck

replies.bodyText: I would prefer to have all of them, themes and others, within an Appearance category. But that's just a preference 🤷
replies.author: fqueiruga

replies.bodyText:
I am not sire that UI === Appearance.

"Appearance" implies look&feel changes which do not impact the functionality
UI is... something related to the User Interface. https://plugins.jenkins.io/ui/search/?labels=ui lists many plugins which offer functional changes

I do not see much sense to keep the "UI" category as is, but IMHO it is a separate discussion.
Right now I suggest to introduce a new "appearance" label, WDYT @daniel-beck @fqueiruga @timja ?
replies.author: oleg-nenashev

replies.bodyText:
imo if I want to find a theme, I search for a theme.
I don't want to find the chuck norris plugin 😄
UI Themes works for me, but I don't understand what other sort of theme there would be?
replies.author: timja

replies.bodyText:
Login themes? Blue Ocean themes? Dunno.
Will change it to UI Themes
replies.author: oleg-nenashev
